thread.section_title: Terrass'' Hotel by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome!
thread.title_full: Awesome! - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cristian O
title: Awesome!
text: everyone very friendly, the rooms are awesome great modern design, the view from the top you can't beat it and the neighborhood has everything you need. you can't go wrong with it, just make sure you use transportation to go to see Paris is kind of far to start and end you day walking here. But we used it as our last days in Paris and it was perfect.
